title: v0.14.2 crashes a few minutes after start

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
This is only happening on one Windows 7 x64 node at work, so far that I'm aware.  I've restarted syncthing twice and each panic appears very similar. 

[JABL6] 15:27:51 INFO: syncthing v0.14.2 "Dysprosium Dragonfly" (go1.6.3 windows-amd64) WIN-P6RP886TVDJ\Administrator@WIN-P6RP886TVDJ 2016-07-26 11:55:25 UTC
[JABL6] 15:27:51 INFO: My ID: JABL6VC

...  several minutes pass ... 

```
[JABL6] 15:39:04 INFO: Connection to RTBSNQZ closed: switching connections
[JABL6] 15:39:04 INFO: Established secure connection to RTBSNQZ at 10.0.1.26:49394-73.202.85.101:44109 (TCP (Client))
[JABL6] 15:39:04 INFO: Device RTBSNQZ client is "syncthing v0.14.2" named "lela-current.dax"
[JABL6] 15:39:05 INFO: Connection to RTBSNQZ closed: reading message: read tcp 10.0.1.26:49382->173.230.149.23:22067: use of closed network connection
[JABL6] 15:39:05 INFO: Connection to RTBSNQZ closed: reading length: read tcp 10.0.1.26:49394->73.202.85.101:44109: use of closed network connection
[JABL6] 15:39:05 INFO: Device RTBSNQZ folder "tunes_mp3" is delta index compatible (mlv=0)
[JABL6] 15:39:05 INFO: Device RTBSNQZ folder "SharedTools" is delta index compatible (mlv=0)
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[JABL6] 15:39:05 INFO: Device RTBSNQZ folder "Eric2ChrisTest" is delta index compatible (mlv=2815)
[signal 0xc0000005 code=0x0 addr=0x38 pc=0x791490]
goroutine 3269 [running]:
panic(0xbf65e0, 0xc082008070)
    c:/go/src/runtime/panic.go:481 +0x3f4
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/connections.(*Connection).ID(0xc08983c030, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
    <autogenerated>:95 +0x60
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/model.sendIndexes(0x37b3758, 0xc08983c030, 0xc08355aad0, 0xe, 0xc089ce2500, 0xc082916460, 0xaff)
    c:/jenkins/workspace/syncthing-release-windows/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/model/model.go:1207 +0x43
created by github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/model.(*Model).ClusterConfig
    c:/jenkins/workspace/syncthing-release-windows/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/model/model.go:733 +0x207a
```
